activities: CSO Research, Inc. provides automation services to university career centers.  As such, students and employers from the UK will be registering their information into a university-sponsored web-based database branded with the UK university name but hosted on CSO Research's servers in the U.S. For students, this data includes their contact information, some limited academic information, a resume/CV and cover letter, and other activity related data.  It includes NO financial data of any kind, nor any government-issued ID number.
personaldata: ALL data is covered by Safe Harbor.
privacyprograms: Self-certified, reviewed by university IT professionals and attorneys.
recoursemech: CSO Research will use the JAMS for dispute resolution
